level_1_values.rationale: The frame promotes advancing oneâ€™s own status by demeaning women, reflecting a focus on personal advantage and dominance over others.

level_2_values.rationale: Encouraging the right to insult women based on their social status is an appeal to controlling and asserting superiority over others.

level_3_values.rationale: The frame implies that the speaker has authority to judge and humiliate women of lower perceived status, legitimizing hierarchical control and dominance.
